EmailTemplate.subject: November Direct-TO Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/big-changes-newsletter-2020?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Engine Operators Eligible for MSP Engine Rebates <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/engine-operators-eligible-for-msp-engine-rebates?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Using Advanced Data Analytics to Analyze Engine use Honeywell is on track to provide operators more than $500,000 in rebates this year, based on how they operate their propulsion engines under the company’s signature Maintenance Service Program (MSP)...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/engine-operators-eligible-for-msp-engine-rebates?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
The RNP Corner <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/11/the-rnp-corner?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>Canadian RNP AR Procedures US operators authorized to conduct Required Navigation Performance – Authorization Required approaches are now able to utilize these types of procedures in Canada...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/11/the-rnp-corner?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
Inside the FMS <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/11/inside-the-fms?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Why Is the FAA Banning General Aviation Operators From En-Route CPDLC? The FAA’s Data Comm program will provide more capability for ATC to communicate digitally with the crew....Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/11/inside-the-fms?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> GoDirect Flight Services Update <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/11/flight-services-update?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> International Trip Support - Summer Games in Tokyo Filing International flight plans is included with your GoDirect Flight Planning service...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/11/flight-services-update?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Help! I Need Somebody! <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/11/pilot-gateway-help?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> More Tips to Get More Out of the Pilot Gateway Everybody needs a little help now and then, and on the Pilot Gateway help is always just a click away....Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/11/pilot-gateway-help?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
